definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: This thesis reviews the background of tax barriers and customs of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 本文考察了太平天國稅關與海關的設立背景。

sentences.english: To be concise, this means that he stands up from his tax post and follows Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 簡而言之，這意味著離開他的稅關，去跟隨耶穌。

sentences.english: As he walked along, he saw a tax collector sitting in his office. This was Levi, the son of Alpheus .
sentences.chinese: 路上，他瞧見阿耳斐的兒子肋未正坐在稅關亭裏。
